title: Can someone explain to me
body: Why Lee Sin, a champion with such high base damage, mobility, innate tankiness and AD scaling, has 5 escapes including flash, and 3 gap closers including flash? He has about everything in the game short of an attack speed slow and hard CC apart for his Ultimate, the attack speed reduction being removed last season, yet he goes unnerfed. Just remove his ability to jump to anything that isn't a champion and he drops to the same level of counter play as Master Yi and Tryndamere.

> Nerfing his W so it doesn't work on minions will hurt Lee Sin dramatically if he wants to go in a solo lane. I know that I use my minions in lane to evade and gap close when playing Top Lee. Your suggestion would reduce him to a supporting jungler instead of an offensive one. Besides, Kat can E onto friendlies so why can't our favourite blind monk?
> 
> P.S. When you mentioned counterplay regarding Yi and Tryn, what were you referring to exactly because I don't see how they are relevant to the post.

Because in a 1v1, Master Yi and Tryndamere are known to have litte counterplay short of hard cc. But with a bit of coordination they get destroyed in team fights but they need to build glass cannon to do so. Lee Sin can build 2 damage items and then tank and outduel both of them, not to mention being able to catch any champion in the game consistently with little to no counterplay as well as having a more impactful team fight.
